title: Navigate forwards to a slider thumb
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb.
assertions: roleSlider nameHotelMinimumPriceUsDollars value100 orientationHorizontal minimumValue0 maximumValue250

title: Navigate backwards to a slider thumb
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Hotel Maximum Price in US dollars' slider thumb.
assertions: roleSlider nameHotelMaximumPriceUsDollars value250 orientationHorizontal minimumValue100 maximumValue400

title: Request information about a slider thumb
instructions: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, read information about the slider.
assertions: roleSlider nameHotelMinimumPriceUsDollars value100 orientationHorizontal minimumValue0 maximumValue250

title: Increment a slider thumb by one step
instructions: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 101.

title: Decrement a slider thumb by one step
instructions: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 99.

title: Increment a slider thumb by ten steps
instructions: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 110.

title: Decrement a slider thumb by ten steps
instructions: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 90.

title: Decrement a slider thumb to the minimum value
instructions: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 0.

title: Increment a slider thumb to the maximum value
instructions: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 250.

title: Adjust the range of a slider thumb
instructions: With focus on the first slider thumb, increase its value to 101. Then, move focus to the second slider thumb.
assertions: roleSlider nameHotelMaximumPriceUsDollars value250 orientationHorizontal minimumValue101 maximumValue400
